name: obsidian-sample-plugin
description: This is a sample plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.deploy: pnpm build && mkdir -p /Users/terrychen/Notes/.obsidian/plugins/sample-plugin && cp main.js manifest.json styles.css /Users/terrychen/Notes/.obsidian/plugins/sample-plugin/ 2>/dev/null || cp main.js manifest.json /Users/terrychen/Notes/.obsidian/plugins/sample-plugin/
